whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us
whyChooseUs.description: Every treat is a labor of love, designed to bring a moment of joy to your day.
whyChooseUs.handMadeDesc: Our treats are made by hand, ensuring the highest quality and attention to detail.
whyChooseUs.naturalDesc: Locally sourced, organic whenever possible, and strictly preservative-free.
whyChooseUs.freshDeliveryDesc: Carefully packaged and delivered straight from our oven to your doorstep.
whyChooseUs.heartfeltDesc: Made with passion, attention to detail, and a whole lot of love.

story.title: The Art of Wagashi-inspired Baking
story.description: At Mochi & Bloom, we believe that baking is a form of meditation. Our journey began in a small kitchen in Kyoto, where we learned the delicate art of balancing texture and taste.
story.description2: We blend traditional Japanese ingredients like matcha, yuzu, and red bean with classic Western pastry techniques. The result? Treats that are not just desserts, but edible moments of calm.

step2.title: Kneading
step2.description: Hand-kneaded with patience to ensure perfect texture.

step3.title: Baking
step3.description: Baked in small batches for consistent quality.

step4.title: Delivery
step4.description: Packaged with care and sent to your doorstep.

review1.author: Koizumi Akihiko
review1.content: The most delicate and flavorful pastries I've ever had. The packaging was beautiful too!

review2.author: Murakami Sachiko
review2.content: Absolutely obsessed with the Matcha Roll Cake. It's not too sweet, just perfect.

review3.author: Elon Musk
review3.content: A wonderful gift for my family. Arrived fresh and tasted like it was just baked.

news.title: Join the Sweet Circle
news.description: Subscribe to receive updates on seasonal specials, new creations, and exclusive offers.
news.promise: We respect your privacy. Unsubscribe at any time.
